unmarked 1.1.1.9020
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Simulated point-transect data

pointtran.Rd

Response matrix of animals detected in five distance classes plus two covariates.

data(pointtran)

Format

A data frame with 30 observations on the following 7 variables.

dc1

Counts in distance class 1 [0-5 m)

dc2

Counts in distance class 2 [5-10 m)

dc3

Counts in distance class 3 [10-15 m)

dc4

Counts in distance class 4 [15-20 m)

dc5

Counts in distance class 5 [20-25 m)

area

a numeric vector

habitat

a factor with levels A B C

Examples

data(pointtran)
pointtran

#>    dc1 dc2 dc3 dc4 dc5     area habitat
#> 1    0   1   0   0   0 7.100135       A
#> 2    0   0   1   0   1 4.039711       A
#> 3    2   1   2   0   0 5.821971       A
#> 4    0   1   4   1   0 6.342220       A
#> 5    0   1   1   1   1 5.253868       A
#> 6    0   5   0   3   0 5.424741       A
#> 7    1   1   4   1   0 3.847850       A
#> 8    2   0   3   0   0 4.382539       A
#> 9    0   1   2   0   0 5.446037       A
#> 10   1   0   0   3   0 3.948828       A
#> 11   0   1   0   0   0 5.648236       B
#> 12   0   4   3   1   0 2.091490       B
#> 13   2   1   0   0   2 5.417844       B
#> 14   0   0   1   0   2 3.697380       B
#> 15   1   0   0   1   0 6.205822       B
#> 16   0   1   3   3   0 2.745845       B
#> 17   2   1   1   0   0 4.793403       B
#> 18   0   2   1   1   0 4.695349       B
#> 19   1   4   0   1   0 6.401240       B
#> 20   1   3   1   2   0 4.263756       B
#> 21   1   1   1   3   1 5.194472       C
#> 22   0   0   3   5   0 4.842365       C
#> 23   0   2   1   1   0 3.926182       C
#> 24   0   1   0   2   1 5.062172       C
#> 25   0   2   2   1   0 4.914785       C
#> 26   0   1   1   0   0 5.340713       C
#> 27   1   0   2   1   1 4.138666       C
#> 28   0   1   1   0   0 4.688052       C
#> 29   3   2   4   0   0 6.321133       C
#> 30   0   0   0   2   0 4.901021       C

# Format for distsamp()
ptUMF <- with(pointtran, {
        unmarkedFrameDS(y = cbind(dc1, dc2, dc3, dc4, dc5), 
        siteCovs = data.frame(area, habitat), 
        dist.breaks = seq(0, 25, by=5), survey = "point", unitsIn = "m")
        })
